name: bibcnrs-button
description: BibCNRS button for a quick access to the fulltext shown near the found DOI in the visited pages

scripts.patchmanifest:1: jq ".version=$(jq .version package.json)" dist/manifest.json > dist/manifest.tmp.json && mv dist/manifest.tmp.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.patchmanifest:2: jq ".name=$(jq .name package.json)" dist/manifest.json > dist/manifest.tmp.json && mv dist/manifest.tmp.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.patchmanifest:3: jq ".description=$(jq .description package.json)" dist/manifest.json > dist/manifest.tmp.json && mv dist/manifest.tmp.json dist/manifest.json
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV=production ; rm -rf ./dist && npm-run-all build:copyfiles patchmanifest:* browserify:* build:minify* build:less
scripts.build:debug: NODE_ENV=developement ; rm -rf ./dist && npm-run-all build:copyfiles patchmanifest:* browserify:*
scripts.build:minify-content: uglifyjs dist/scripts/index-content.js > dist/scripts/index-content.min.js ; mv dist/scripts/index-content.min.js dist/scripts/index-content.js
scripts.build:minify-background: uglifyjs dist/scripts/index-background.js > dist/scripts/index-background.min.js ; mv dist/scripts/index-background.min.js dist/scripts/index-background.js
scripts.watchify:less: mkdir -p dist/css/ && watch 'lessc ./app/css/content.less > dist/css/content.css && echo "-> content.css written [$(date +%T)]"' ./app/css/
scripts.watchify:images: mkdir -p dist/images/ && watch 'cp -f ./app/images/* ./dist/images/ && echo "-> images/ copy [$(date +%T)]"' ./app/images/
